metadata.title: CVE-2022-1495 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in Downloads in Google Chrome on Android prior to101.0.4951.41 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the APK downloads dialogvia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
